subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The N.F.L. told the Steelers that Ben Roethlisberger could play in their preseason games before starting a suspension, but that does not mean the team plans to let him.
snippet: The N.F.L. told the Steelers that Ben Roethlisberger could play in their preseason games before starting a suspension, but that does not mean the team plans to let him.
